Posted By: Lord_of_Tresserhorn (3/3/2012 4:06:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I love this card and it's art.  
What's especially fun is to have it copy a creature with, as example, "comes into play with four +1/+1 counters", so you got a 4/4 doppelganger. Next turn, you copy something with evasion, like a 2/2 flyer. Since the doppelganger keeps the counters, you then have a 6/6 flyer. ^^
posts.html:
